todos.title: Dashbaords
todos.body: Visual tool that can be seen by everyone and is used to measure company metrics.

todos.title: Type with your mouth
todos.body: Use speech to text typing.  It is faster than using your hands.

todos.title: Split Screen
todos.body: Use a background image to split your screen into two or three parts.  Size each window to fit within a section.

todos.title: Colemak Keyboard
todos.body: Type using Colemak keyboard.  It is faster than a Qwerty keyboard.

todos.title: Learn primarily with your eyes
todos.body: Read books, not audio books.  Only listen to text to proofread what you write.  You can visualize information 10x faster than you can hear it.  You also retain more information viewing it (people remember 10% of what they hear, 30% of what they read, and 65% of what they hear and read).

todos.title: Smarter Not Harder
todos.body: Fifty percent of the time it takes you to do any task should be spent on infrastructure, learning, or automation (building speed resource, knowledge base, hacks, tools, tricks, processes, inventions, or software, to cut down the time it takes you to do that task again).

todos.title: File Sharing
todos.body: Single location for files that can be accessed by all parties.

todos.title: Contact Sharing
todos.body: Single location for contacts that can be accessed by all parties.

todos.title: Task Management
todos.body: Keeping lists of the groups tasks.

todos.title: Batching
todos.body: Creating blocks of time to focus on one type of task (example 30 min blocked out just for answering e-mails).
